description: NTS Map: 082J11A great array of trails, you can mix 'n match sections to suit your groups abilities and make it as flat/hilly and long/short as you want.  Great signage and access throughout the area.As well, the PLP Visitors Center features a great display area with stuffed Mountain Lion, Big Horn Sheep, Griz & few other critters.Click Here  for a map of PLP.Click Here  for snow and trail grooming conditions.
directions: Go 49.7km S of TransCanada #1 on Hiway 40 and turn west into the PLP.  Between ~Dec 15 and June 15 hiway 40 is closed at the turn so it is very easy to find.For this section of trails, once you turn off #40, drive 2.2 km  and keep to the left.  Drive another 3.7km to the Elkwood Parking lot.There are several other areas you can park in off the same road.
title: Peter Lougheed Park - Amos - Wheeler
